import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { AiFillGithub, AiOutlineTwitter, } from "react-icons/ai"; import { FaLinkedinIn } from "react-icons/fa"; import '../Footer/Footer.css' function Footer() { let date = new Date(); let year = date.getFullYear(); return (

Designed and Developed by John Nguyen

Copyright Â© {year}

 ) } export default Footer;
